projects.title: BeYourSoft Apps
projects.description:
A portfolio of all the example apps made by BeYourSoft S.L. using:
Backend: MVC.Net Core 3.1
Frontend: Angular 9 + Angular Material
projects.author: BeYourSoft S.L.

projects.title: ToDo List
projects.description: ToDo List app using differents backend and frontend technologies as example of good practices.
projects.author: BeYourSoft S.L.

projects.title: Ship Hunter
projects.description: Mini game based on well known Battleship table game.
projects.author: BeYourSoft S.L.

projects.title: Lucky Dicer
projects.description: Simple multi-platform application to throw different type of dices.
projects.author: BeYourSoft S.L.

projects.title: Coupler
projects.description: Game of memory find the partner based on completely in Angular technology and pure css.
projects.author: Gabriela Coronado

projects.title: Wedding Prototype
projects.description: A prototype of web and mobile application for weddings.
projects.author: Gabriela Coronado
